statements: UPDATE charitable_giving_trends SET total_donations = 50000, average_donation = 100, largest_donation = 5000, num_donors = 200 WHERE year = 2021;
UPDATE charitable_giving_trends SET largest_donation = 10000, average_donation = 150, total_donations = 75000, num_donors = 180 WHERE year = 2020;
UPDATE charitable_giving_trends SET total_donations = 50000.75, average_donation = 250.50, largest_donation = 1000.25 WHERE year = 2020;
UPDATE charitable_giving_trends SET total_donations = 70000.25, num_donors = 1500 WHERE year = 2021;
UPDATE CharityDonations SET donation_amount=500 WHERE donation_id=1
UPDATE Donors SET donor_email='newemail@example.com' WHERE donor_id=2
UPDATE CharityDonations SET donation_amount = 500.0, donation_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE donation_id = 1

UPDATE philanthropy_donors SET donation_amount = 1000 WHERE donor_id = 1;
